participant_2.background:
I have won an olympic medal.
I skydive frequently.
I need certain medications to live.
I like the band queens of the stone age.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love skydiving! It's a great way to get some adrenaline and see the world from a different perspective.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've never skydived before, but it's always been something I've wanted to try.
You should definitely give it a try! It's one of the most amazing experiences you'll ever have.
I'm definitely going to put it on my bucket list! So, what other hobbies do you have?
I also like to play video games, watch movies, and listen to music. I'm a big fan of the band Queens of the Stone Age.
Oh cool, I like them too! I'm also a big fan of video games and movies.
That's awesome! We should totally hang out sometime and play some video games or watch a movie.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm free this weekend if you want to get together.
Sure, that sounds great! I'll bring my copy of Mario Kart and we can have a race.
Sounds like a plan! I'll see you this weekend.
